description: This file contains unit tests for the NoteController in a Spring Boot application, verifying that key endpoints like Swagger UI and the notes API are accessible.

classes.name: NoteControllerSmokeTest
classes.description: Test class for smoke testing the NoteController endpoints to ensure they load correctly.

methods.name: swaggerUiLoads
methods.description: Tests that the Swagger UI page loads successfully.

methods.name: apiListEndpointLoads
methods.description: Tests that the API endpoint for listing notes loads successfully.
